channel.title: How to make an npc hit harder, and emotes?
channel.description: I searched all overrr!! google, here, rune-server, rune-locus, everywhere!! no tutorials at all for how to make an npc hit harder, or change its attack emote, and death emote? lmaoo anyways, it would be helpful if you guys can help.. thanks =p

item.title: How to make an npc hit harder, and emotes?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

um what should i search?

how to make npc hit harder?
how to give an npc an attack and death emote?

tried it all…

can u tell me what to search hunt?
